description.zh-cn: 中国工程地质与灾害地质专家，长安大学教授。2019年当选为中国科学院院士。
description.en: An expert in engineering geology and disaster geology, a professor at Chang'an University. Elected as an academician of the Chinese Academy of Sciences in 2019.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国湖北省黄冈市下辖的县级市，是彭建兵的出生地。
description.en: A county-level city under the administration of Huanggang City, Hubei Province, People's Republic of China, and the birthplace of Peng Jianbing.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国陕西省西安市的大学。
description.en: A university located in Xi'an, Shaanxi Province, China.

en: Academician of the Chinese Academy of Sciences

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国设立的科学技术方面的最高学术称号，为终身荣誉。
description.en: The highest academic title in science and technology established by the People's Republic of China, a lifelong honor.

description.zh-cn: 中国地质大学（武汉）的前身。
description.en: The predecessor of China University of Geosciences (Wuhan).

description.zh-cn: 西安工程大学的前身之一。
description.en: One of the predecessors of Xi'an Polytechnic University.

description.zh-cn: 中国地质学领域的最高荣誉奖项。
description.en: The highest honor award in the field of geology in China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国科学院地学部院士

zh-cn: 中国科学院地学部院士

description.zh-cn: 中国科学院地学部的院士群体。
description.en: The body of academicians in the Division of Earth Sciences of the Chinese Academy of Sciences.
Peng Jianbing is from Macheng, Hubei.

description.zh-cn: 彭建兵于1978年毕业于武汉地质学院，获工学学士学位。
description.en: Peng Jianbing graduated from Wuhan College of Geology in 1978 with a Bachelor of Engineering degree.

description.zh-cn: 彭建兵于1999年毕业于西安工程学院，获博士学位。
description.en: Peng Jianbing graduated from Xi'an Engineering College in 1999 with a doctoral degree.

description.zh-cn: 彭建兵是长安大学的教授。
description.en: Peng Jianbing is a professor at Chang'an University.

description.zh-cn: 彭建兵于2019年当选为中国科学院院士。
description.en: Peng Jianbing was elected as an academician of the Chinese Academy of Sciences in 2019.

description.zh-cn: 彭建兵于2015年获第十四届李四光地质科学奖教师奖。
description.en: In 2015, Peng Jianbing received the Teacher Award of the 14th Li Siguang Geological Science Award.

description.zh-cn: 根据页面分类信息，彭建兵是中国共产党党员。
description.en: According to the page category information, Peng Jianbing is a member of the Chinese Communist Party.

relationships.target: 中国科学院地学部院士

description.zh-cn: 根据页面分类信息，彭建兵是中国科学院地学部院士。
description.en: According to the page category information, Peng Jianbing is an academician of the Division of Earth Sciences, Chinese Academy of Sciences.

relationships.source: 中国科学院地学部院士

description.zh-cn: 中国科学院地学部院士是中国科学院院士的一部分，按学科领域划分。
description.en: Academicians of the Division of Earth Sciences are part of the Academicians of the Chinese Academy of Sciences, categorized by academic field.
